metadata.title: Kekkai
metadata.description: Kekkai - Local-first AppSec orchestration and compliance checker. Integrates security scanning tools (Semgrep, Trivy, Gitleaks, OWASP ZAP) with DefectDojo for centralized vulnerability management.
metadata.summary: Local-first AppSec orchestration and compliance checker
metadata.tags: security appsec cli devsecops vulnerability-scanner compliance
